title: game not loading then getting 20 min bans
body: Basically i started a game, all champs loaded as normal except for one guy. happened to be my adc but yanno. game didnt start up so i restarted my client and the game loaded. the adc was still not there and everyone was level 3... so i started another game and yet again another player hadnt loaded but the game never loaded for me either. can someone help please sick of getting bans

replies.body:
You're seeing penalties against your account because you have a trend of disconnections on your account. There are a number of reasons why you may be having issues loading into matches, however, the most common reason is due to a poor connection to the server. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions for this issue, and it's a great first step in troubleshooting this issue. Be sure to test any changes in a custom match to avoid further Leaverbuster penalties.

Let me know if you still have issues after taking the steps in that guide.
